meanings.definition: Wood from coniferous trees, typically used for construction.
meanings.sent1: The carpenter selected a piece of softwood for the new bookshelf.
meanings.sent2: Softwood is often chosen for building houses because it is strong and easy to work with.
meanings.sent3: Why did the softwood go to the party? To show off its sturdy nature!
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as solid as a softwood beam, unwavering and strong.
meanings.sent5: The softwood forest whispered secrets of strength and resilience.
